meanings.sent1: She is nondiabetic and does not need to monitor her blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the patient is nondiabetic after running some tests.
meanings.sent3: Even though he loves sweets, he remains nondiabetic and healthy.
meanings.sent4: The nondiabetic lifestyle allows her to enjoy a wide range of foods without worry.
meanings.sent5: Living nondiabetic means taking care of your body to prevent diabetes.

meanings.definition: A person who does not have diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The nondiabetic in the group always makes healthy food choices.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a nondiabetic and has never had any issues with blood sugar.
meanings.sent3: The nondiabetic at the party was the first to finish the fruit platter.
meanings.sent4: Being a nondiabetic means not having to rely on insulin injections.
meanings.sent5: She aspires to be a nondiabetic by maintaining a balanced diet and exercise routine.
